post.body: i LOVE a ghost is born
I agree!
haha. I'm so mean, but it was just too funny not to do it. Dear photographers: If you have a questions, ask! Don't be shady.
Happy Birthday! I hope you have an amazing day and find time to relax at least a little! :)
double thanks! Although clearly you're not THAT thankful or you would've shown up at Little Tijuanas for #avatarday. ;)
ohhhhhhhhhhhhhh! Probably the funniest tweets in history. And Little T's trumps shoveling EVERY time
don't be dramatic, I'll pay for the h2o
@jennbarnett told me to Twitter to you that we're confused. What performance? Your "that's what she said" didn't make sense, either
and @jennbarnett are exhausted from a long, hard #avatarday. Nervous @jennbarnett is going to pass out while driving us home
@alexajonesteen, and @s4xton I'm expecting to see you at Little T's ASAP! Also, @jennbarnett keeps getting more followers. WTF?
and @saramontour are now wondering: "where exactly is Little T's?"
is crying b/c she's getting no messages on any social networking sites. & for some reason 53 people have stopped following her
clearance shmearanca, they're just rude. @jennbarnett REALLY. You should see this guy
oooh, I'm intrigued! #twittershowdown probably better than #redneckhoedown anyway
That's what she said
The one on University does. That's what I get for not supporting local establishments.
HAHA!
and I are wandering university ave looking for anything exciting. We have collected 47 bottles of colt 45. #ghettoshowdown
and I could've just taken the worst photo booth pics in history. We'll tell you in 2 1/2 minutes. #photoboothshowdown
Agreed. I just eat less now. haha.
I like your #hashtagthrowdown !
Actually, my fave SRV song is Lenny. It's totally instrumental and fluid and perfect. LBTDis classic, though. Love it.
Color me totally jealous!
Eureka! #harvestshowdown
almost killing us while rushing to get to kmart for #photoboothshowdown
You should look at all the facts before pointing blame! #avatarday3 cut short b/c we found out there was ping pong @kck
@doubleasterisk I just said eff it and went with a little Ray LaMontagne.
Agreed!
Yikes! That does not sound fun AT ALL
retweet from @heathergarland: @saramontour Twitter blog said it was down, they are trying to fix it ASAP!
It's not working with mine, either.
damn you! I had the map for where I need to go all set on my phone, but then I clicked your twitpic & now I have to do it all over
Obviously a new camera. ;)
and I have a very important question for you all! What's better, a short, catchy domain name or having the .com?
I'm in the same boat. I'm holding off until about 1, though. YIKES
which lab are you using now?
Have fun!!
http://twitpic.com/vd5y - Zip your coat!
Sushi! It's been SO long! (At least a week)
http://twitpic.com/pyaf - Just finished the Mood Swings photos from the Sussedtacular...
Jessy Greene's playing the Grammy Nominations Live concert with the Foo tonight @ 9. They're covering You're So Vain. Nice!
Editing through my Sussedtacular photos. Sallie was totally rockin' it!
I think I just got an email from a photographer posing as a potential client but really just phishing for info. Photostars? WWYD?
Today's song obsession: Hayden - Home By Saturday
Entourage break, then back to editing.
What's that? You want to see a Roaring 20's photo booth movie? Well, all right! http://www.beetour.net/?p=243
Just realized that I didn't have Askimet enabled on the BeeTour blog. Good bye, viagra, zoo sex, and cialis spam!
http://twitpic.com/ppjj - Jetson Brown
SERIOUSLY. iMovie HD has SO MANY BUGS. I shouldn't have to trick a program into doing what I need, and it does things differently EVERY time
Ugh. Bought iStopMotion yesterday, but I don't think it's going to do what I need it to. al;vnawei;laejflakwj! I need Final Cut.
If you want to buy this for me that'd be ok: http://tinyurl.com/649hob
Lacking all motivation today. I hope it comes rushing back soon because I have SO MUCH to do.
#turfclubshowdown http://flickr.com/photos/barefootphotos/3072268901/
Didn't think I'd be so emotional about the studio. A lot of things happened there, both professional and personal. Time to look forward.
Trying to figure out what to wear tonight. I need new clothes.
http://twitpic.com/r3vc - Can't sit here. Reserved for a peoples
http://twitpic.com/r4a4 - Shooting The Babb Report
http://twitpic.com/r4gd - BeeTour hard at work
Bee quote of the night "the best part about this place is that from where I'm standing I can see 5 bars"
What do @jennbarnett and I have to do to make you guys quit following us? I sincerely apologize if any of you have SMS on us. Good night!
No avatars were actually created, but I don't think that should be a measurement of the success of #avatarday
#avatarday
Reminiscing about how an hour and a half ago we told the waitress we were going to wait to order until our "friends" got here.
http://twitpic.com/qkbs -
http://twitpic.com/qk9j - 140 characters no more!
http://twitpic.com/qk8d - Tornado'd! #avatarday
Maybe it's time to come to the realization that #AvatarDay needed more planning.
http://twitpic.com/qk5n -
Waiting for @solace and @alexajonesteen. @jennbarnett still crying as she has more qwitters by the minute. @alexajonesteen's name too long
Can't decide on which nachos to get. Beef, chicken, fish, beans, shrimp, veggie, plain, or pork. Help! And then come buy them.
http://twitpic.com/qk1m - Avatar day! Ready, set, go!
Now approaching 26th & Nicollet. Exciting to get Avatar Day underway!
We have another photographer on the stage situation.
http://twitpic.com/r51j - IMG00363.jpg
Man, I wish you guys could see some of these dresses
I could sleep for 5 years straight.
Laura and I just spent 5 hours with the MN Vikings and we have no idea who we met. We can only name Darren Sharper. He looks taller on TV.
Just looked at my bank account and Trocadero's charged my card $40. Really? 2 vodka/red bulls and a red bull? $40? No, I hate you.
Oh, Monotonix: http://onelouderphoto.com/2008/12/08/monotonix/
Bon Iver break. Love Blood Bank, not so stoked about Woods. You?
Bring it, winter!
Wondering why on earth I decided to get on 394 instead of just going through downtown #badnavigationaldecisionshowdown
4th gear, bitches! #shiftershowdown
I've been driving in 1st gear for 20 min, my clutch foot is killing me #shiftershowdown also, #jennbarnettneedsadrinkwithalimeshowdown
Vicious Vicious photos from The Turf Club last night are up: http://saramontour.com/music/?p=50 Unfortunately forgot to scan photobooth pics
Coffee shops that have wireless passwords are lame. Hear that, Dunn Bros? LAME
Heading to Dunn Bros to steal some internet. Mine's not getting hooked up until Wed. Anyone have a wireless router just chillin?
Eating at Jay's Cafe with G. What should I get, everything looks awesome!
Damn. The chick I was... sharing... internet with (from?) just password protected it. #comcastshowdown
http://twitpic.com/qvn9 - @strippershowdown
Thinking of stopping at Arby's on the way home for a #roastbeefshowdown
Man, hilarious people watching at #turfclubshowdown tonight
http://twitpic.com/qvit - #bartendershowdown
Re: @jennbarnett preferably something with a LIME
In old news, Erik Applewick is beautiful. #turfclubshowdown
been in @jennbarnett's car for 3 min. Already went wrong way through atm, dropped my card on the ground, & ran it over #turfclubshowdown
Bringing my ladder to #turfclubshowdown so @jennbarnett and I can set it up on stage and get some sweet angles.
Hold onto your effing hats, Twitter. @jennbarnett and @saramontour are headin to the Turf Club.
A Fine Grind is playing RE: Stacks. Productivity = lost. Nostalgia = in full force.
I like the simplicity of Atmosphere's video for Guarantees. Even with Slug's molestache.
Sick of spam "helping photographers get through the recession". If you're a photographer, you're a photographer, recession or not. Buck up!
Just had an awesome dinner & drinks with fellow MN Photostar Eliesa of @photogeninc!
Just accidentally typed b33tour. I guess I can't hide my inner 1337 h4x0r
http://twitpic.com/rhs1 - Editing a great family session. This little boy was hilarious!
Need dark chocolate. STAT. #cravingshowdown
Just randomly turned on Cities 97 for the first time in forever and they're playing my fave Stevie Ray Vaughan song. Well, all right.
You know it's a good day when, in order to keep driving straight, you have to turn thew wheel 180 degrees. #snowshowdown
Feeling better than this morning. Now at Spyhouse with all the angsty kids trying to kick my #productivityslowdown
#photoboothshowdown @ http://avatarday.tumblr.com/ Now with commentability courtesy of Disqus! Full transcript coming soon.
Didn't get the death stare from the Clown Lounge bartender tonight! & he gave me a lime w/o asking, AND he said it was guaranteed delicious
http://twitpic.com/s3ns - FAIL!
Twitpic's totally hosing us tonight. We're way funnier with photos. Get excited for the avatarday.tumblr.com update! ;) to the turf!
After finally finding the Nye's booth (and dolla bills, y'all) we're on our way to the Kitty Cat for PING PONG. Meet us! #photoboothshowdown
Found the photo booth, but now the bartender's gone and we don't have any 1's. Thinking of going to the Seville to find (work for?) some.
Now cannot find the photo booth at Nye's. Anyone? #photoboothshowdown FAIL
I'm now interviewing for a new co-twitterer. Preferably one that can type and won't eff up my hashtags.
Kmart was a bust. No photo booth and no B.U.M. shirt. Now trying Nye's #photoboothshowdown
Hoping to pick up a sweet new B.U.M. Equipment sweatshirt while I'm here! #photoboothshowdown
#avatarday3 now ending after an amazingly successful night. About to start a photo booth tour.
What bars in the Twin Cities have photo booths? Besides the Turf and the Kitty Cat?
We have music, a guitar, wine, and cameras. Like that could ever add up to a bad time. #avatarday3
http://twitpic.com/s2gn - @jennbarnett tried to cook. Yikes!
Worst photobooth photos ever, courtesy of #turfclubshowdown http://avatarday.tumblr.com/
It's looking like tonight is a night built for Entourage and Emergen-c.
UGH. I feel like I got sucker punched right in the immune system.
Todays LOLs are brought by all of you California kids that are talking about the "freezing cold rain". Really? -4, bitches. -30 Wind chill.
I've had a 1/2 done slideshow sitting on my computer for a full day because I can't find the PERFECT song.
Wish my iPod wasn't in my car. 1. b/c it's effing freezing & it probably hates me. 2. b/c it's effing freezing & I don't want to go get it
Not stoked to drive home in this frozen, icy mess.
It's just been decided that the Jenn and Sara show are crashing WPPI, road trip style. GEAR UP!
#productivityslowdown has hit @jennbarnett & I once again. Anodyne's playing Wilco/BillyBragg, which I love, but isn't helping.
Is it seriously raining outside? Dear: everyone that doesn't believe in global warming. Come to Minnesota, this is ridiculous.
Just woke up from the best nap ever. Maybe not ever, but it was awesome and much needed. Anyone know set times tonight for @FirstAvenue?
Strongly considering a nap. I didn't sleep at all last night.
Just scored a new lens at National and didn't even have to pay, just ponied up my 28-135.
Off to shoot some robots. Is the Heiru show sold out?
Totally overwhelmed, but home now, with sushi and music.
People that don't know how to search are funny. Courtesy of BeeTour search phrase stats: "girl and child and fashion and photograph" What?
Boo. 35w south is ruining my life #holidaytrafficshowdown
Playing santa and delivering orders to clients. In bloomington. And by Bloomington I mean pretty much Apple Valley. Contemplating MoA. Ugh
Starting my Christmas shopping for the year. I like to leave myself plenty of extra time, so I start early.
Song of the moment: Iron & Wine - Boy with a coin
Really? Michael Franti in a Playstation 3 commercial?
I need a break.
The Hopefuls photos are up! http://saramontour.com/music/?p=58
My music photos have suddenly morphed from this: http://tinyurl.com/9e8vke to this: http://tinyurl.com/6tgapa
Dear Minnesota: the sun hath set, turn your headlights on. Love, Sara
Rupert: http://vimeo.com/2605207 Stop motion style
http://twitpic.com/vcoe - The Hopefuls' axes of awesome.
http://twitpic.com/v9zb - @howwastheshow Psh. Whatever. That ghost doesn't even do anything, he just talks on the phone. ;)
http://twitpic.com/v9zb - @massdistraction I know, right? I just converted it to B&W and all the sudden he appeared!
